name: Dreams RPG - a tabletop game
short_description: Dreams is the result of many years of hard work to create a better tabletop RPG. Open for editing, expanding, and improving, the system is designed for open ended game-play with the ability to adapt to the player's needs.
summary: An Open Source RPG - a tabletop game
